alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 2:50PM MDT until March 20 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Locally stronger gusts expected on the lee side of the Raft River and Grouse Creek Mountains. Travel may be difficult for high profile vehicles on I-80 as gusts of 40 to 45 mph are expected during the afternoon. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 3 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Crosswinds are expected mainly along west to east oriented routes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
